title: Victorious Sivir's Splash Background

embed.description: Late addition to the list, Teleport no longer has reduced cooldown for TP to allied turret.] The PBE has been updated! As we near the end of the 5.22 PBE cycle, the splash art for Victorious Sivir has been added, new in-game finishers for the All-Star team summoner icons are now working in game, and we have a few more tentative balance changes!

body: Anyone else seeing Anor Londo in the background of Sivir's Victorious splash art?

replies.body: Will Gragas Caskbreaker ever make it there?

Also, I would like to just freak out real quick. Oh my god, my first Red comment!

Love you KindleJack. Send my regards to the art team.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Midnight,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2kOjJpZq,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-11-11T17:50:58.020+0000)
>
> Also, I would like to just freak out real quick. Oh my god, my first Red comment!
> 
> Love you KindleJack. Send my regards to the art team.

Well these skins were a bit of a passion project for me being a huge RPG/D&D/Dark Souls fan so I'm really happy you're interested in them! I've been suggesting we do them since I joined Riot and the Skins Team did an amazing job. Coincidentally some of the other concept artists on my team main Varus, Braum and Garen so I'm looking forward to playing jungle Gragas with them using the skins >xD

Now that I think about it, it _is_ weird that it took so long to get RPG-esque skins going. 

That Ryze skin has been an obvious one from the start, going hand in hand with Veigar Greybeard.

Will Diana get a Dark Sun Gwyndolin skin ????!!!! O: 
#bladesofthedarkmoon
I was thinking switch the Solaire to Leona, and give Gragas Seigmeyer's armour.
Also, if anyone can tell me how to put a picture directly in a post, it would be greatly appreciated.

just copy paste the image url
https://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2762/8852/original.jpg
You need to post the image url in ( ) brackets, then in the [ ] brackets before that image url paste the url again. I hope that was helpful.
Anor Londo is the capital city from the first dark souls game
Oh.  That explains my lack of knowledge.
